name: Slicing Slicing
description:
"Slicing Slicing" is a casual game where players can score points by cutting a small ball that appears on the screen in half.
【Game Operation】
The player presses the left mouse button and slides the mouse to cut the ball in half.

【Game Mode】
Regular Mode: Players have 3 chances to miss, but switch to the bomb game and fail.
Chill Mode: Players play the game within a specified time.No bombs will appear in this mode.
【Game Features】
Although the game is simple, it also requires a certain skill and reaction speed. This game is suitable for playing for a while at leisure.
